name: The Quest for the Holy Noodles
name_original: The Quest for the Holy Noodles
description:
Your quest is simple: Find the Holy Noodles!

Talk to the townsfolk to determine the location of the noodles! Interact with static elements of the world to find clues and acquire items!

(W, A, S, D to move, E to interact, Escape to open the menu, I to open the inventory)
